note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: External call to msg.sender.call.value occurs before updating userBalances, allowing reentrant calls to transfer() before the balance is reset
Unchecked arithmetic on userBalances: addition and subtraction are performed without overflow/underflow protection (no SafeMath)
External call to msg.sender via call.value before clearing the user balance; a malicious fallback can revert or consume gas causing withdrawBalance to always fail and lock funds.
Missing msg.data.length validation in public transfer(address to, uint amount) allows short address attack
Floating pragma version (^0.4.24) allows different compiler versions which may introduce inconsistent behavior
